bn:00105808a: Indicating the most important performer or role

bn:00071731n: Person who sings, is able to sing, or earns a living by singing.
A singer; a person who likes to sing.
A person who sings, is able to sing, or earns a living by singing.

bn:00031012n: A person who tries or whose job is to please, entertain or amuse.
A person who tries to please or amuse

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man singer emoji with a medium-light skin tone is captured in a moment of passionate vocalization, his mouth open as if belting out a tune. Apple's signature soft gradients and realistic lighting give the figure a dynamic and engaging presence, while the glossy finish on his microphone and attire adds a touch of performance flair.  The smooth, rounded edges of his form convey a sense of artistic expression and the joy of music.
